title: Nature Domain
content:
om, their saving throw proficiencies are Wisdom, Charisma and they have a Hit Dice of 1d8 per Cleric level. They have proficiency with All simple weapons and with Light armor, medium armor, shields. The Nature Domain subclass adds Heavy Armor, Shillelagh, Acolyte of Nature, Speak with Animals, and Animal Friendship as features.

You embody the vast viridian power of the natural world, an avatar of the subtle divinity of fruitfall, avian migration, woodland silence, and the landslide's roaring fu
